parameters.name: Bitmap
parameters.description: Control standard type as defined in swBitmapControlStandardTypes_e

title: IPropertyManagerPageBitmap.SetStandardBitmap
description: Sets the bitmap or PNG image for this control.

parameters.name: Bitmap
parameters.description: Control standard type as defined in swBitmapControlStandardTypes_e

returns: True if the bitmap or PNG image is set, false if not
remarks: You can use this method before, during, or after the PropertyManager page is displayed or closed. If you use this method when the PropertyManager page is displayed, use a bitmap or PNG image that is the same size.
